languages.text: Каторжан стало больше, чем работы для них. Излишек можно изгнать в джунгли — со временем они заматереют и одичают в клановых стычках, и из них можно будет отбирать бойцов для службы.

There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.
languages.original_text: Каторжан стало больше, чем работы для них. Излишек можно изгнать в джунгли — со временем они заматереют и одичают в клановых стычках, и из них можно будет отбирать бойцов для службы.

traits.locale_text: There are now more convicts than work. The surplus can be expelled into the jungle — over time they will become wild and harden in interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

There are now more convicts than work for them. The surplus can be expelled from their quarries — over time they will run wild and harden, and from them it will be possible to select fighters for service.

There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.
There are now more convicts than work. The surplus can be expelled from their quarries — over time they will run wild and harden, and from them it will be possible to select fighters for service.

There are now more convicts than work. The surplus can be expelled into the jungle — over time they will become wild and harden in interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

languages.text: Il y a maintenant plus de condamnés que de travail. Le surplus peut être conduit dans la jungle. Une fois endurcis par la rudesse des conditions et les conflits entre clans, les meilleurs combattants pourront être sélectionnés pour entrer au service {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

traits.locale_text: Il y a maintenant plus de condamnés que de travail. Le surplus peut être conduit dans la jungle. Une fois endurcis par la rudesse des conditions et les conflits entre clans, les meilleurs combattants pourront être sélectionnés pour entrer au service {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: 今や囚人の数は仕事の数を上回っている。余計な囚人は、はジャングルに追いやることになる。やがて彼らは野生化し、クラン間の争いで鍛えられ、彼らの仲で最も優れた戦士が使いとして選ばれるだろう。
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

traits.locale_text: 今や囚人の数は仕事の数を上回っている。余計な囚人は、はジャングルに追いやることになる。やがて彼らは野生化し、クラン間の争いで鍛えられ、彼らの仲で最も優れた戦士が使いとして選ばれるだろう。

languages.text: 犯人的数量现已远远超出工作需要。多余的犯人会被赶到丛林之中，风餐露宿的生活与部落之间的冲突会让他们变得越来越强悍，而最出色的那些战士将会被甄选出来，为您的王朝效力。
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

traits.locale_text: 犯人的数量现已远远超出工作需要。多余的犯人会被赶到丛林之中，风餐露宿的生活与部落之间的冲突会让他们变得越来越强悍，而最出色的那些战士将会被甄选出来，为您的王朝效力。

languages.text: Ahora hay más presos que trabajo. Es posible enviar al excedente a la jungla. Con el tiempo, se volverán más salvajes y los conflictos entre clanes les obligarán a ser más duros. Llegado el momento, los mejores guerreros podrán ser reclutados.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

traits.locale_text: Ahora hay más presos que trabajo. Es posible enviar al excedente a la jungla. Con el tiempo, se volverán más salvajes y los conflictos entre clanes les obligarán a ser más duros. Llegado el momento, los mejores guerreros podrán ser reclutados.

languages.text: Es gibt jetzt mehr Sträflinge als Arbeit. Den Überschuss kann man in den Dschungel treiben. Mit der Zeit werden sie durch Konflikte zwischen den Clans wild und abgehärtet, woraufhin man dann die besten Kämpfer für den Dienst auswählen kann.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.

traits.locale_text: Es gibt jetzt mehr Sträflinge als Arbeit. Den Überschuss kann man in den Dschungel treiben. Mit der Zeit werden sie durch Konflikte zwischen den Clans wild und abgehärtet, woraufhin man dann die besten Kämpfer für den Dienst auswählen kann.

languages.text: Sayıları arttığı için hükümlülere iş bulmak da zorlaştı. Fazlalıkları ormana salıp zamanın ve klanlar arası çatışmaların etkisiyle güçlenmelerini sağlayabiliriz. Böylece hizmet için aralarından en kuvvetli olanları seçebiliriz.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The surplus can be driven into the jungle — over time they will become wild and be toughened by interclan conflicts, at which point the best fighters among them will be selected for service.
